docs.text: Welcome to PyMono Py-mono is the python API wrapper for mono.co Getting Started Register on Mono website and get your Authorization key. Setup your mono connect with your mono public key Set Your "MONO-SEC-KEY" Installing pip install py-mono Environment Key os.environ['MONO-SEC-KEY'] = " " Usage Import from pymono import Mono Exchange Key or Authenticaton mono= Mono('mono-code') mono.Auth()
